Mondelez International: Nabisco's parent company, announced the closure of biscuit bakeries in New Jersey and Georgia by summer 2021.
The reason for the closures was attribut: aging infrastructure and outdated production capabilities," not President Joe Biden's election.
Mondelez explicitly stated that no U: S. jobs would be moved to Mexico as a result of these closures.
Other fact: checking organizations have also debunked the claim that the closures were linked to Biden's election.
